title: Redbelt font (case still unsolved)
content:
Does anyone know what the font of the Main title of Redbelt is?

[http://www.joblo.com/newsimages1/redbeltposter-big.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421215117/http:/www.joblo.com/newsimages1/redbeltposter-big.jpg "http://www.joblo.com/newsimages1/redbeltposter-big.jpg")

Thank you loads for your help!  
Pj

author: pigeoninpjs
